data.comment: The match has started at Den Dreef Stadium.
Duckens Nazon is on target to give St. Truidense a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 28, Duckens Nazon (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kristiyan Malinov for Oud-Heverlee has been booked by Jasper Vergoote and receives a first yellow card.
An attacking Oud-Heverlee player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Thomas Henry scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Jasper Vergoote has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Oud-Heverlee make their first substitution with Moussa Al-Taamari replacing Thibault Vlietinck.
Josh Eppiah is replacing Olivier Myny for Oud-Heverlee at Den Dreef Stadium.
Chris Durkin (St. Truidense) has received a yellow card from Jasper Vergoote.
In the minute 64, Frederic Duplus (Oud-Heverlee) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Pierre-Yves Ngawa.
Goal! Oud-Heverlee have got their heads in front thanks to a Josh Eppiah strike.
Great play from Kristiyan Malinov to set up the goal.
In the minute 80, Kevin Muscat is making the team's first substitution at Den Dreef Stadium with Facundo Colidio replacing Chris Durkin.
Goal! Duckens Nazon equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
The away team replace Yuma Suzuki with Seung-Woo Lee.
Jasper Vergoote blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
The away team have replaced Oleksandr Filippov with Buatu. This is the third substitution made today by Kevin Muscat.
St. Truidense's Liberato Cacace has been booked in Heverlee.
Pol Garcia is booked for the away team.
